structure.unit: ARTICLE CXXXIII. MIAMI-DADE HOUSING CIVIL RIGHTS OVERSIGHT BOARD

text.section:
Sec. 2-2052. Creation and Purpose.
There is hereby created the advisory board called the "Miami-Dade Housing Civil Rights Oversight Board" (hereinafter "Oversight Board"). The purpose of the Oversight Board is to monitor the compliance with the Fair Housing Act and other housing-related civil rights laws, regulations, ordinances and the County's antidiscrimination policies by the Miami-Dade Public Housing Agency, the Department of Housing and Community Development, and other County departments which administer housing programs and to report on such compliance to the Board of County Commissioners annually.
